text: Braveheart is an American historical movie war drama movie starring Mel Gibson and Sophie Marceau. It is loosely based around the life of 13th century Scottish warrior William Wallace, who fought against the English when they occupied Scotland. ==Actors in Leading Roles== * Mel Gibson - as William Wallace * Sophie Marceau - as Princess Isabelle * Patrick McGoohan - as King Edward I == Other websites == * * Category:1990s biographical movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:1995 drama movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American biographical movies Category:1990s American drama movies Category:American epic movies Category:American war movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:Movies that won the Best Makeup Academy Award Category:1990s English-language movies Category:1990s historical movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies set in Scotland Category:Movies set in Edinburgh Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies directed by Mel Gibson Category:Movies composed by James Horner Category:Movies set in the 13th century Category:Movies set in the 14th century Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Braveheart
